column4: im on imdb.com and i wanna view a trailer, is there a plugin i need to install to view wmv videos in firefox? i clicked the plugin button but it said there was nothing
wmv are a pita in linux....try to have a look at !restricted
i have read all of those before, i have installed w32codecs and what goes along with it, is there a plugin for firefox or no?
I'd say...no, there isnt...you have to dl the wmv in order to watch it
